title: Demon Vocalizations
description: Demon Vocalizations sound package with 168 high-quality monster sound effects, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/demon-vocalizations-preview

Full Audio Preview: https://youtu.be/FjUjGQjdtK0

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ym0vx5atilporcf/MSE%20-%20Demon%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


A Demon is a sinister creature, big, strong and powerful, taking souls, so someone else lives in it, small and evil. All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 18 voice actions, including 168 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 16 voice sounds during an attack
  • 8 battle shouts
  • 4 biting voice sounds
  • 16 deaths
  • 16 growls
  • 16 pains
  • 16 roars
  • 8 snarls
  • 8 victory shouts
  • 4 coughing sounds
  • 8 effort sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 8 idle voice sounds
  • 8 sounds when jumping
  • 8 laughing sounds
  • 4 sounds of upset
  • 8 snorting sounds
  • 4 sounds of tiredness


Among the attacking type of vocalizations there are both short and long ones, the pain type vocalizations also have different lengths. The voice samples are quite dry and ready for further processing. Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs.Â 


This package is perfect for creating the voices of monsters: demon, devil, dark elemental, dark lord, ghost, reptile, alien and otherworldly infernal creatures.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 168 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 18 voice actions
  • 76 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 40 voice samples of the pain type
  • 52 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 168

Number of Audio Cues: 168

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 4 minutes 28 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
